title: Why is pixel such a crappy phone?
content:
Garbage. I don't get texts for months. Or voicemails. I can't tell you how many doctor appointments I missed because of this phone. HEY GOOGLE!!! 
If it's CANCER, probably could have been found earlier since your device is incapable of receiving phone calls. Everyone gets forwarded to a full voicemail box even though I keep it empty. My friends literally don't talk to me anymore because I "don't respond". Your phone is a joke and I am tired of it. I have a serious lump in my neck and you can't even fix your bugs so I miss the "over-the-phone" doctor appointments. Fuck 2020, Fuck Google Pixel.
